text: Ovays Azizi (Dari: اویس عزیزي, born 29 January 1992) is an Afghan footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Ariana FC and the Afghanistan national football team. ==International career== Azizi made his debut for the Afghanistan national football team in a 2-0 friendly loss to Thailand on 3 September 2015. ==Personal life== Azizi was born in Afghanistan, and lost his father and grandparents in the Afghan Civil War. At a young age, his mother and his 4 siblings were refugees in Iran. In 2001, he was accepted as a refugee in Denmark. Azizi is a semi-professional footballer, who also works as an occupational therapist. ==References== ==External links== * * NFT Profile Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Herat Category:Afghan footballers Category:Afghanistan international footballers Category:Afghan emigrants to Denmark Category:Afghan expatriates in Iran Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:BK Avarta players Category:IF Skjold Birkerød players Category:Maziya S&RC; players
title: Ovays Azizi
